article.class: post-11042 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

div.h1: Talking to kids about COVID-19 and new handwashing songs

div.p: Talking to kids about health emergencies can be tough, especially since we are working through our own feelings of uncertainty at the same time.
Here are links to some resources from your old friends at Sesame Street on ways to have gentle conversations and new songs to sing while you wash your hands.
Sesame Street – Guidance on talking to your kids about COVID-19
And…just for fun……the new Baby Shark Handwashing song
